title: Product Owner (m/f) - ISG Personalmanagement
subtitle: Wien, W
body:
Our client is recognised as a worldwide provider of cutting edge continuous software testing solutions. Its software testing tool is revolutionising test automation, making automation easy even for those who have limited to no programming experience.
Our client is located worldwide with headquarters in Europe and offices throughout the world.
We are looking for a product owner, who is passionate about highly agile development cycles.

Product Owner (m/f)

Your Role & Responsibilities
  • Work closely with Product Managers, Software Architects, UX Designers, Developers and QA to translate high-level requirements into User Stories and review their implementation
  • Define and develop user stories and acceptance criteria
  • Maintain the product backlog and assist Product Management to translate product vision and strategy and feature objectives into actionable product features
  • Be the subject matter expert for your product's capabilities and future plans
  • Be a member of an agile team in the role of a product owner and participate in sprint reviews
  • Provide first line training/guidance and coaching on new products/features to all internal audiences
Your Qualifications
  • Ideally 3+ years professional work experience in the field of Product Management
  • Prior experience with mobile applications is an advantage
  • Prior experience in agile environments in the role of a product owner is an advantage
  • Prior experience in test automation is a plus
  • Fluent English language skills (both verbal and written)
  • Collaborative and team player, “can-do” attitude
  • Creative and forward thinking with excellent communication skills
  • Open-minded personality, hands-on attitude and passionate about interacting with multi-national stakeholders
  • Unlimited work permission for Austria
Our Offer
  • Favorable working atmosphere in a rapidly expanding company
  • Attractive salary + variable compensation
  • Personal and professional development as well as a wide range of tasks
  • Open and diverse corporate culture in an inspiring working environment
  • Flexible working times
  • Company cell phone and laptop
  • Permanent, full-time employment
  • Great events for employees
  • Modern office with chill zone (Virtual Reality, PlayStation, Wii U, table football, …)
  • The annual package will be a minimum of € 50.000 pa and will be significantly higher according to your proficiency and experience .

If you are interested in this attractive career opportunity, please submit your application for ID Number 73.985 on ISG-CareerPortal or send an eMail.
